title: Frozen Permanents of E. coli Cultures
procedures:
1. Inoculate 5ml LB 100ug/ml ampicillin \(or other appropriate antibiotic for your culture) with cells.
  2. Grow overnight on roller.
  3. Mix 800ul culture with 200ul 100% w/v glycerol \(sterile) in sterile screw cap freezer tube.
  \(usually make several tubes)
4. Invert a few times
  5. Bury tube in dry ice until frozen solid.
  6. Store in -80Â°C freezer.
